name: wasmdom
description: gormantec implementation of assembly script for DOM based PWA apps.

scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm run asbuild:optimized && npm run asbuild:releasewww
scripts.webpack: npm run asbuild:releasewww && npx webpack && cp -f ./dist/main.js ../gcode/js/wasmdom.js && cp -R -f ./package.json ../gcode/dist/wasmdom && cp -R -f ./assembly/* ../gcode/dist/wasmdom/assembly && cp -f ./dist/wasmdom.wasm ../gcode/modules/wasmdom.wasm && npm run serve-demo

author: gormantec
